title: Book Review: ‘The Seven Moons of Maali Almeida,’ by Shehan Karunatilaka
description: “The Seven Moons of Maali Almeida,” which won the 2022 Booker Prize, is an account of wartime Sri Lanka by the ghost of a photojournalist.
dc:creator: Randy Boyagoda
media:description: Colombo, Sri Lanka, in the 1990s. “The Seven Moons of Maali Almeida” examines life in Sri Lanka during its civil war.
